issue.title: [Rust] [Integration Testing] Show output from arrow-json-integration-test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8854](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8854). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Show output from arrow-json-integration-test. It is currently hidden, making it hard to debug the test failures.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8854?focusedCommentId=17111655) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
